subject: Re: 1st night  with Radio Shack-hack at Fort Mifflin
author: ejspinn
full_text:
I am using the 12-469 radio hacked by myself with the help of UFOGeek's step by step video on youtube.

Sorry for not stating that earlier.  I wish i had the older one 12-470 with the built in speaker.  from the video's i been watching it doesn't seem to have that annoying click in between each AM channel.

After conditioning my ears i can block outthat clicking noise now, but my teammates can't and get distracted from it.
